channel.title: [Pi] Clicking Objects help [Pi]
channel.description: Hello everyone, so there are some objects in my server that only allow you use them from distance. For example, if I click on a staircase in CastleWars while I'm standing right in front of it, nothing happens, but it will let me use it if I am 3+ squares away from it. I'm not sure what files we need to look at so if you know the answer, please help me out, or if you need to see a file, just ask. Thanks!

item.title: [Pi] Clicking Objects help [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hello everyone, so there are some objects in my server that only allow you use them from distance. For example, if I click on a staircase in CastleWars while I’m standing right in front of it, nothing happens, but it will let me use it if I am 3+ squares away from it. I’m not sure what files we need to look at so if you know the answer, please help me out, or if you need to see a file, just ask. Thanks!

Read full topic
